scripts.smoke-mac: npx bare-dev build && cd build && mkdir -p ../../pear/by-arch/darwin-arm64/bin/bare &&  mv bare-runtime ../../pear/by-arch/darwin-arm64/bin/bare/bare && ../../pear/by-arch/darwin-arm64/bin/bare/bare -v
scripts.smoke-linux: npx bare-dev build && cd build && mkdir -p ../../pear/by-arch/linux-x64/bin/bare &&  mv bare-runtime ../../pear/by-arch/linux-x64/bin/bare/bare && ../../pear/by-arch/linux-x64/bin/bare/bare -v
scripts.smoke: [ "$(node -p process.platform)" = "darwin" ] && npm run smoke-mac || npm run smoke-linux
